original_title: Nisem ji pomahala, ko se je odpeljala z busom, čeprav vem, da je pogledala ven
overview: Veronica is full of life, as befits a ten-year-old girl. However, when she accompanies her grandmother to the oncology institute together with her mother and older sister, she slowly begins to understand that life can sometimes be bitter.
title: I Didn't Wave Her Goodbye When She Left on a Bus Even Though I Knew She Looked Outside
